title: Want to Buy Backs for my Back Run
author: wazoo

posts.post_title: Want to Buy Backs for my Back Run
posts.post_content:
Hey guys, I can't believe it already, but after my recent trade (Thanks so much Matthew!), I'm already at 22/36 backs in the set. 36, of the ones in which I count of course. I've collected all over the place, and my new recent goal is to complete my back run by the time I'm 20. I know this is kind of fast (4 years is fast to me), but I'm ready to face it. Any help would be much appreciated. 

Right now cannot afford those true toughies: Red Hindu, Lenox, Drum, Brown Old Mill, etc, but I can dream! 

Right now I am looking to purchase or trade for:
Sweet Caporal 350-460 Factory 25. 
Sweet Caporal 350-460 Factory 42 Overprint
Sovereign 150 Subjects 
American Beauty 350 (No frame)
American Beauty 460

If I obtain these other 5 backs, I will be at 27/36, or 75% down with my back run. That'd be awesome! I'd love to be able to say that by this year. I am in no rush of course, but I know these backs are obtainable. Thanks once again.

Here's a Fact. 42 overprint with the fact 30 showing. Let me know if you're interested. [url]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/url]

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/mhgt/hoft206/fortrade/websize/Rucker%20Sweet%20Cap.jpg[/IMG]
